title: Riot please help
body: about 33% of my lobby's i cant pick a champ to ban, making me dodge and lose lp and also gain 30min que? my internet is fine but im sick of losing lp cause i cant ban a fcking champ?! lose two promos because of this issue aswell. please do something riot

replies.body: It sounds like your client is having a hard time getting a solid link the game server you were playing on. This is probably being caused by some network setting being a little off, but let's be sure to go through all the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we cover all our bases.
